title: Diamond Smurf playing in gold 3 atm need fwends to play with for fast ques

replies.body: Lol going 14-5-8 today in plat 5 mmr totally a silver player lel

LUL. Is that supposed to be impressive -- against Plats? Btw that game was Silvers and Golds, fyi. You having to point out a single game where you did well makes it even more obvious. Just be honest and admit you're a boosted monkey, ty.

> [{quoted}](name=BQNqee,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=GoQY6Hju,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2016-10-07T04:21:37.001+0000)
>
> Lolz dont need to prove anything here not sure why ud assume im boosted when ive been playing games againts plats on this acct for having high MMR. not sure why so salty doe are you bronze want me to help u or sumthin?

Looks like he just posted on his main account by accident, which is Gold 3,, a long ways off from being a "Diamond smurf."

How was that plat 5 mmr?

Silver 3 Cait (Person you faced)
Silver 1 Wukong
Gold 5 Morgana
Gold 5 Voli
Gold 3 Lux

That is like Gold 4 MMR, and you are Gold 3.

When you click "Check MMR" 

"Your MMR is quite a bit lower than average.
1,478 "

Why lie so much?
